story-moment.BIRTH: Vision surprised the Avengers when he effortlessly held Thor’s hammer shortly after his “birth.”
story-moment.DESTRUCTION OF ULTRON: Vision destroyed the final Ultron robot, after the two discussed their differing viewpoints on humanity.
story-moment.CIVIL WAR: During the battle that broke out between Iron Man and Captain America’s factions over the Sokovia Accords, Vision inadvertently injured his own teammate, War Machine
story-moment.TRACKED BY THANOS: In Scotland, two of Thanos’ followers tracked Vision down, attempting to remove his Mind Stone for their master.
story-moment.DESTRUCTION OF THE MIND STONE: Vision convinced the Scarlet Witch to destroy the Mind Stone, despite what it meant for his own existence, when Thanos arrived in Wakanda.

powers+abilities.INTANGIBILITY: Decreasing his density, Vision can become intangible and is able to pass through walls, objects, and even other beings.
powers+abilities.ENERGY BLASTS: The Mind Stone on Vision’s head can be used to create a powerful energy blast.
powers+abilities.SYNTHEZOID: Vision can change his appearance, causing his clothing to look different or to make his synthetic skin appear more human.
powers+abilities.FLIGHT: While intangible, Vision is able to levitate in the air
